string.value: Jake, who works at the subway station at the center of Kerning City has something on his mind.\r\nHead over to #bJake#k and see what's going on.\r\n
Jake says he wants nothing more than to see Blake achieve his dream. Who's Blake anyway?\r\nPass through the turnstile and go over to Kerning Square Station.\r\n
Blake has asked you to wait, as he was in the middle of something.
*sigh* It's too bad. It's just too bad. Do you want to know what's too bad?
I have a coworker named Blake who has a dream that can easily come true with a little bit of help. He definitely has the talent, but I'm on duty and I can't just leave to help him, you know?
Will you please go see Blake and help him out? You'll run into #bBlake#k if you enter through the Kerning City Subway Turnstile and head over to #bKerning Square Station#k.
Please hold on. I'm already looking for someone's lost belonging. I'll be right with you in just a few.
You'll run into #bBlake#k if you enter through the Kerning City Subway Turnstile and head over to #bKerning Square Station#k.
